_sText:
Terrorists have boarded a spacecraft used by an elite police force :O

Anyway, there is a bombsite in the engine room in the lower decks of the ship.  Also there is one on the top of the mothership near the machines powering the large thrusters.

<font color = #ff0000><big>***The thrusters kill you if you touch the beams***</big></font>

There is low gravity outside the ship, but returns to normal once inside the ship.

The terrorists start in the hanger, Screenshot C and the counter-terrorists start in the bridge, screenshot A.

Most of the textures are custom and are included in the rar file.  Just extract them to your materials folder.

<font color=#00ff00>Specials Thanks:</font>
T-R-O-N for the best space themed skybox I have seen which is why I used it.  Nosoul for taking the screenshots since my computer sucks :(.  And also Ramaq for testing and finding the bugs before release.  And Chizbone for improving the navigation file.

<font color = #ff66ff>Have Fun and please assess and favorite if you like the map!!</font>

<font color=#00ff00>U</font><font color=#ff0000>P</font><font color=#0000FF>D</font><font color=#00ffff>A</font><font color=#ff00ff>T</font><font color=#FFff00>E</font>

I went through my older maps and found some errors with packing or outdated files and whatnot, so I added a new download with everything packed.  It made the map quite large but its alot easier to handle now.  Enjoy!
